topic.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
topic.body: Raj and Simran fall in love during a trip to Europe but return to India to find their families have arranged their marriages to different people.

topic.title: Sholay
topic.body: Two criminals, Veeru and Jai, are hired by a retired police officer to capture the ruthless dacoit Gabbar Singh.

topic.title: 3 Idiots
topic.body: Three engineering students deal with the pressures of society and the education system while searching for their missing friend.

topic.title: Lagaan
topic.body: During the British Raj, a group of villagers challenge the British to a cricket match to avoid paying high taxes.

topic.title: Bahubali: The Beginning
topic.body: The story of Shivudu, a young man who learns about his heritage and seeks to avenge his father's death.

topic.title: Bahubali 2: The Conclusion
topic.body: Shivudu's quest to avenge his father's death leads him to uncover the truth about his family and kingdom.

topic.title: Gully Boy
topic.body: A street rapper from Mumbai strives to achieve his dream of becoming a music sensation despite the challenges he faces.

topic.title: Andhadhun
topic.body: A blind pianist becomes embroiled in a murder mystery, leading to unexpected twists and turns.

topic.title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
topic.body: Based on true events, the film follows the Indian Army's covert operation to avenge the Uri attack.

topic.title: Queen
topic.body: A young woman embarks on a solo honeymoon trip to Europe after her wedding is called off, leading to self-discovery and empowerment.

topic.title: Dangal
topic.body: A former wrestler trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers, defying societal norms and expectations.
